document.full_text: the united states urged saudi arabia on monday to show restraint after it sent troops to neighboring bahrain in a move some analysts said showed the limits of washington's influence in the region.
document.title: u.s. urges restraint by gulf nations in bahrain
lines_and_colors: the united states urged saudi arabia on monday to show restraint after it sent troops to neighboring bahrain in a move some analysts said showed the limits of washington's influence in the region.
